alert.note: Alert for Lake; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued July 29 at 4:25AM EDT until July 29 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...High wave action and dangerous currents expected at Lake Michigan beaches. Waves 3 to 6 ft expected. * WHERE...Lake IN and Porter Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Swimming conditions will be life threatening, especially for inexperienced swimmers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous waves may continue beyond 1 PM. The Beach Hazards Statement will be extended if wave heights remain in the 3 to 6 foot range early this afternoon.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid dangerous swimming conditions and do not venture out onto piers, jetties, breakwalls, or other shoreline structures.
